title: MySQL Shell GUI
author: Emma Script
content: MySQL Shell GUI is a repository of MySQL Shell extensions. MySQL Shell GUI uses the functionality of MySQL Shell, but provides additional functionality such as a native interface from within Visual Studio Code.

title: Sequelize v6
author: Mark Up
content: Sequelize is a promise-based Node.js ORM tool for Postgres, MySQL, MariaDB, SQLite, Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle Database, Amazon Redshift and Snowflakeâ€™s Data Cloud. It features solid transaction support, relations, eager and lazy loading, read replication and more.

title: What is Handlebars?
author: Jay Son
content: Handlebars is a simple templating language. It uses a template and an input object to generate HTML or other text formats.

title: Heroku Deployment
author: Ajax Handler
content: Heroku manages app deployments with Git, the popular version control system. You do not need to be a Git expert to deploy code to Heroku, but it is helpful to learn the basics.
